cleaned_text: Health is more than the absence of disease. It is a state of optimal well-being. —World Health Organization Homeopathy Is... Safe Remedies are highly diluted and have no toxic side effects; they can be safely used for babies and children, pregnant women, and the elderly. Flexible Can be used alongside any medicines prescribed by your doctor. Natural Triggers the body's own healing system Inexpensive Most remedies cost less than $10. Individualized Remedies are selected based on the individual symptoms rather than on a disease name. Popular The most commonly used form of alternative medicine and the second largest system of medicine in the world, 1 in 4 Europeans uses homeopathic medicine and more than 500 million people worldwide. Homeopathy can help adults and children with many acute and chronic ailments, such as - Food poisoning, viruses, insect bites and stings, dental work - Kidney stones, back pains, arthritis, hay fever, digestive issues, chronic fatigue, thyroid conditions - Anxiety, grief, sleep problems, ADD/ADHD, post traumatic stress (PTSD), traumatic brain injury (TBI), PMS, postnatal depression, menopause, memory and concentration issues - Sports injuries, trauma, bruising
